statements: SELECT * FROM transaction_records
SELECT user_id, amount FROM transaction_records WHERE amount > 100
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount, timestamp FROM transaction_records WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT user_id, status FROM transaction_records WHERE status = 'completed'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transaction_records WHERE amount < 50
SELECT * FROM transaction_records WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transaction_records WHERE status = 'completed' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT user_id, amount, timestamp FROM transaction_records WHERE amount > 1000 AND status = 'approved'
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount, timestamp, status FROM transaction_records WHERE amount < 5000 OR status = 'pending' ORDER BY transaction_id
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount, timestamp, status FROM transaction_records WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01'
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT user_id, product_id, quantity FROM transactions WHERE user_id = '12345-67890';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transactions;
SELECT user_id, SUM(total_price) AS total_spent FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE total_price > 100 ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id FROM transactions WHERE quantity = 1 AND total_price < 50;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_amount >= 500 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id, product_id;
SELECT user_id, AVG(payment_amount) AS average_payment FROM payments GROUP BY user_id HAVING AVG(payment_amount) > 100;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions;
SELECT payment_amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 50;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 500 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2021-08-01' AND '2021-08-31';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(transaction_id) > 3;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username='john_doe';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category='Electronics' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_amount > 100 ORDER BY payment_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card' ORDER BY payment_date;

SELECT t.transaction_id, u.username, p.product_name, py.payment_amount FROM transactions t JOIN users u ON t.user_id = u.user_id JOIN products p ON t.product_id = p.product_id JOIN payments py ON t.transaction_id = py.transaction_id ORDER BY py.payment_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, product_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT order_id, product_id, order_date, order_quantity FROM orders ORDER BY order_quantity DESC, order_date;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_address LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT transaction_id, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payment FROM payments GROUP BY transaction_id HAVING total_payment > 500;
SELECT product_name, product_price, product_category FROM products WHERE product_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_orders > 3;
